title: Cuda - found suitable version "7.5", minimum required is "5.5"
body_html:
While trying to compile from source (via conda) I get the following:

-- TH_LIBRARIES: /home/patrick/git/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib/libTH.so.1
CMake Error at /home/patrick/anaconda3/share/cmake-3.6/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:148 (message):
  Could NOT find CUDA (missing: CUDA_CUDART_LIBRARY) (found suitable version
  "7.5", minimum required is "5.5")
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /home/patrick/anaconda3/share/cmake-3.6/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:388 (_FPHSA_FAILURE_MESSAGE)
  /home/patrick/git/pytorch/cmake/FindCUDA/FindCUDA.cmake:1013 (find_package_handle_standard_args)
  CMakeLists.txt:28 (FIND_PACKAGE)
